meanings.definition: A type of annelid worm with few setae on each segment.
meanings.sent1: The biologist studied the oligochaete in the lab.
meanings.sent2: I found an oligochaete while digging in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The oligochaete tried to count its setae but kept losing track.
meanings.sent4: The oligochaete moved slowly, resembling a tiny earthworm ballet.
meanings.sent5: The oligochaete's few setae made it stand out among the other worms.

meanings.sent1: The oligochaete habitat was carefully maintained by the researchers.
meanings.sent2: She conducted an oligochaete survey in the wetlands.
meanings.sent3: The oligochaete party was a hit among the worm community.
meanings.sent4: His oligochaete-like movements on the dance floor caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The oligochaete environment was peaceful and serene.
